    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioButtons

        public RadioButtons(int x,
                    int y,
                    Game game,
                    java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] images,
                    int numButtons,
                    int spacing,
                    boolean horizontal,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Radio button constructor
        Parameters:
        x - integer, x position on screen
        y - integer, y position on screen
        game - game object
        images - BufferedImage[] object, assets for the Radio buttons
        numButtons - integer, number of buttons in the cluster
        spacing - integer, spacing between the buttons
        horizontal - boolean, wether the cluster is rendered horizontally or vertically
        width - integer, width of buttons
        height - integer, height of buttons
